pg001_title: Building the Future with Trusted Knowledge
pg001_intro_paragraph: Hakuu Technology Co., Ltd. specializes in corporate investment, M&A, and technology consulting. We operate across a wide range of sectors including real estate, tourism, food & beverage, trade, and e-commerce, supporting clients in achieving sustainable growth and value creation.
pg001_feature1_desc: Extensive experience in investment, consulting, real estate, tourism, F&B, and international trade.
pg001_feature2_desc: Multilingual and multicultural support with a global network for international business development.
pg001_feature3_desc: Headquartered in Shinjuku, Tokyo, we grow alongside the local community.
